psykerTalents.name: Essence Harvest
psykerTalents.description: Replenish 30% Toughness over 5 seconds on gaining Warp Charge.

psykerTalents.name: Warp Absorbtion
psykerTalents.description: Replenish 10% Toughness when you kill an enemy with a Warp attack.

psykerTalents.name: Quietitude
psykerTalents.description: Replenish 5% Toughness for each 10% of Peril quelled.

psykerTalents.name: Psykinetic's Wrath
psykerTalents.description: Gain between 5% and 15% damage with force weapon attacks, based on your current Peril.

psykerTalents.name: Wrack And Ruin
psykerTalents.description: Killing an Elite or Specialist with Brain Burst applies 2 stacks of Soulblaze to all enemies within 3 meters of the target.

psykerTalents.name: Psychic Communion
psykerTalents.description: Whenever you or an ally in Coherency kills an enemy, you have 4% chance to gain a Warp Charge.

psykerTalents.name: Psykinetic's Aura
psykerTalents.description: +15% combat ability cooldown reduction on Elite kill (Allies in Coherency).

psykerTalents.name: Cerebral Lacerations
psykerTalents.description: Damaging an enemy with your Brain Burst ability causes them to take +15% damage from all non-Warp sources for 5 seconds.

psykerTalents.name: Kinetic Deflection
psykerTalents.description: While below critical Peril, blocking an attack causes you to gain Peril instead of losing Stamina.

psykerTalents.name: Kinetic Shield
psykerTalents.description: Take between 10% and 33% reduced Toughness damage from Ranged Attacks based on Peril.

psykerTalents.name: Mind In Motion
psykerTalents.description: Your movement speed is not reduced while quelling Peril.

psykerTalents.name: Warp Battery
psykerTalents.description: You can store up to 6 Warp Charges.

psykerTalents.name: Kinetic Overload
psykerTalents.description: While you have maximum Warp Charges, gaining a Warp Charge instead applies 4 stacks of Soulblaze to a nearby enemy, prioritizing Elite enemies.

psykerTalents.name: Kinetic Flayer
psykerTalents.description: All attacks have 10% chance on hit to Brain Burst the target. This cannot occur while at critical peril and has a cooldown of 15 seconds.

psykerTalents.name: Quicken
psykerTalents.description: Psykinetic's Wrath expends all Warp Charges, reducing the cooldown by 12.5% for each Warp Charge removed.

psykerTalents.name: Ascending Blaze
psykerTalents.description: Psykinetic's Wrath expends all Warp Charges and applies stacks of Soulblaze to enemies hit based on the number of Warp Charges expended. Enemies killed by your Soulblaze effects (from any source) have a 10% chance to grant you a Warp Charge.

psykerTalents.name: Kinetic Barrage
psykerTalents.description: For 10 seconds after using Psykinetic's Wrath, your Brain Burst charges 25% faster and consumes 50% less Peril.
